title: Sidewall, 1835–50
medium: Block-printed, applied color lithograph, stamped gold motifs
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: In center, vertical oval medallion brought to a rectangle by rustic framework printed in blue and overstamped in gold. Diagonally repeating on field, conventionalized spiky foliate motif in blue overstamped in gold. Enclosed in frame, applied lithographed medallion displaying Alpine scene, with mountains, lake boats, chalet and figures. Vertical rectangle.

exhibitions.title: Rooms with a View: Landscape & Wallpaper

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1835–50.
1835–50. Block-printed, applied color lithograph, stamped gold motifs. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-45-70.
